name: Unknown Number (Twine)
description:
Unknown Number is a text-based game where based around a mysterious phone call that you randomly get. Do you answer?

----

Why Unknown Number? I had some inspiration one day to make a text-based game around the movie Jigsaw. It does feature some mature language.

This game was first created in the program Twine, it was recently converted it to a Unity game.

----

To play the Twine to Unity version: TBA
